text: Jill Rips is a 2000 Canadian American Slovenian erotic thriller movie directed by Anthony Hickox and was based on the 1987 novel by Frederic Lindsay. It stars Dolph Lundgren, Danielle Brett, Kylie Bax, Kristi Angus, Charles Seixas. ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 thriller movies Category:2000s erotic movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:American erotic movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Slovenian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Anthony Hickox
title: Jill Rips
